name: Spunj Act 1: microwaving your sponge
description:
You are a bacterium living in a sponge full of food scraps. Activate the failsafe and escape the sponge before you're microwaved and die!

My first "completed" game, for the Random Wikihow Jam. My prompt was "How to Clean a Sponge"

CONTROLS: Arrow keys to navigate. I to open inventory. Click and drag items from the inventory to solve puzzles.

Made in Construct 3. Less than 5 minutes to beat. Features (poorly) hand drawn art by yours truly.

I wasn't able to get the key and lightbulb to display in the inventory for some weird reason and I ran out of time for the jam before I could fix it - just picking them up is enough to solve the puzzle/unlock the door.

Bubble sfx by snottyboy, Microwave sfx by SPANAC. Inspired by Japanese escape room games by Neutral and Neatescape.
